nodes.text: Kyja Cho was a noble and art thief during the Galactic Civil War, a galaxy-wide conflict between Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Cho was the owner of a rare krayt dragon pearl, which held an auction fpr on her sail barge, the Azure Sunset. In attendance were Hutt crime lords, other aristocrats and executives from the Corporate Sector Authority. An Inquisitor disguised themselves as a CSA executive, being sent secretly on behalf of the Galactic Empire.
